item.description: Sitecore USA would like to invite members of the Sitecore New England User Group to attend a gathering of Boston-area friends and colleagues to celebrate the holiday season. Please join us for beverages, hors ﻿﻿d'oeuvres and friendship as we celebrate our shared success and ﻿﻿look forward to a mutually prosperous New Year. Attendance will be limited, so please RSVP appropriately. We'll look forward to seeing you there!
item.name: Sitecore Holiday Season Reception
